EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.In Person Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Next Week: A New Approach to Big Data, 2/17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for registering for A New Approach to Big Data <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-live> next week!
Join us for:
- An executive update with Scott Yara - A product update with Sunny Madra - Customer & partner Insights - An overview of what's next for big data with a special industry guest
Location: 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor, San Francisco Date: Tuesday, February 17, 2015 Time: 10:00AM - 1:30PM
Agenda 10:00AM - 11:00AM: Registration & Coffee Hour 11:00AM - 12:30PM: Pivotal Strategy Update with Scott Yara & Sunny Madra 12:30PM - 1:30PM: Lunch *Pivotal Labs tour following lunch
Please find event details below and let us know <mailto:info@pivotal.io> if you have any questions.
{{my.Save The Date - In Person:default=edit me}}
See you soon,
The Pivotal Team
